column4: a quick easy answerable problem   i want to burn the alt iso to disc however the cd dosent want to give up the ubuntu live cd thats in the drive how do i get that out
You can't, unless you loaded the liveCD to ram
load the liveCD to ram, or get another CD drive
for many distributions I've used, you just add copy2ram to the boot line. However I'm not sure with Ubuntu.
